message: Let's divide fairly, considering the inflation you'll face if we delay.
I'll take the lead with a fair offer. Let's get this done.
Considering the inflation, my offer is more generous than it seems. Let's settle.
Inflation is hitting, but I'm willing to compromise. Let's settle this now.
Inflation is indeed taking its toll on your share. I'm being more than fair here.
This is my final offer. We are running out of time, and I'm willing to make a significant concession to avoid losing everything.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm giving you another chance. Don't let inflation destroy your share.
